answers.answer: My friend failed & end up having gestational diabetes. Her baby was perfectly fine. She just had to monitor her diet and sugar. My child has always measured larger than what the app says.
My pregnancy is the same way but for some reason my glucose levels are completely normal. My baby is 4 weeks more developed than he should be.
my sons 3 pounds as well and I'm 28 weeks. I havent had my test yet, but I'm pretty concerned.
I failed it and I'm 34 weeks now I have to do the 3 hr one and I am so dreading it.
I failed the 1 hour one but passed the 3 hour one.It's more common to fail the 1 hour one than the 3 hour test.The weight sounds about right...at 31 weeks my girl weighed 3 lbs, 10 oz.
I failed to i have to see a nutritionist I'm 31 weeks
My mother failed the 1 hour but passed the 3 hour when pregnant with my baby sister. She told me to be prepared for that, but I passed my 1 hr. It is fairly common to fail 1 hr and pass 3 hr I think.
I failed the 1 hour but the 2 hour was fine. Last ultrasound my baby was around 3 pounds which was at 30 weeks
I failed the 1 hour but the 2 hour was fine. Last ultrasound my baby was around 3 pounds which was at 30 weeks
I failed the 1 hour but pass the 3 hour. A friend has never passed the 1 hour and she is on 4.

I was so bummed to fail the first time,  I'm going in Friday for the 3hr test,  though it's pretty cool how most off y'all know How much your baby weighs,  I'm going to have to ask but my next US is till 36 wks and I'm barely 30 .

Thanks ladies!! Just wanted to make sure. I have already cut sugar just in case I fail this 3 hour test. It just sounds like I will have a 9lb baby at this rate. I am only 5'4 and started at 113. Now 138. Blehhh.

I failed the 1 hour test and had to take the 3 hour test... failed that too... was diagnosed with gestational diabetes just last week.... I have to monitor my blood sugar levels through my diet and check my sugar levels 4 times a day... the diet is high protein/ low carbs and sugar...
Oh and my last ultrasound baby was measurint at 2lbs 4oz--- it was at 27 weeks
I failed my 1hr but just passed my 3hrs one but with my son I failed both

The lab lady said if I fail my three hour test. Theirs a five hour test!!! I was like wait. I dont know is there is another test. Thanks for the tip. I already cut sugar, just need to cut more carbs then.
Never heard of a 5 hour test.... I might knock my doctor out if I had to be there for 5 hours... 3 hours at the doctors office was long enough!!

When it comes to carbs-- you gotta switch to whole wheat grains... less refined starches the better... so I make spaghetti and use whole wheat pasta or spaghetti squash... use whole wheat tortillas or corn instead of flour... whole wheat bread... sugar-free ice cream or diet soda... the sucky part is testing the blood sugar levels... there are only so many places I can poke on my fingers :(
Did you have to go on a high, high carb diet. For 3 days before test ?
Yes... they want to see how your body will break down the sugar... since carbs turn into sugar...

question: Anyone else failed the one hour test? I just did the three hour test last Thursday, had my ultrasound today at 28 weeks and they said shes about three pounds now. The app says baby is approximately 2.2 lbs. Tech said shes not abnormally big and that she is growing on track.
title: Failed One hour glucose test, baby is 3lbs at 28 weeks
